events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product did not meet my expectations and I would like to request a refund.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer’s message about returning the product.
An agent has been assigned to assist with the refund request and to guide the customer through the process.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund process. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, may I also ask for the reason you want to return the product and if it is unopened or used?
The product just didn’t fit my needs and I have already opened the package, but I have not used it yet. My order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the details. We can offer you a full refund if the product is returned within 14 days. I will send you the return shipping label now.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate the quick response and will send the product back as soon as I receive the shipping label.
The return shipping label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the product, your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to confirm if you have returned the product and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your refund.
Yes, I sent the package back yesterday and I am happy with how smoothly everything went. Thanks for your help!
Your refund has now been processed and should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
We are closing this case now. Please feel free to contact us if you have any other issues or questions in the future.
